OOC: Wow that's the longest message I've ever written.

::Enertron::
    Enertron landed on planet Earth long ago.  He spent most of his time in 
hiding ashamed of his beast mode.  He is forced to live with his deformed 
beast mode.  It is that of a dragon.  It is not a large, fierce dragon, 
however.  It is a small pup of a dragon that was scanned.  Thus he lives with 
a beast mode of minimal size and no power.  He makes up for that with 
incredible speed and a powerful robot mode.  In robot mode he can control 
energy to the point where he can emit beams of pure energy from his hands.  
He also has the ability to craft blades of pure energy in an instant.  The 
blades disperse as soon as he releases them and are thus no threat to him.

    He wandered away from where he had been living.  He happened to live in 
an area that was rarely visited by other bots to better his hiding.  Because 
of this the puny dragon was startled to see a very large and vaguely 
dragon-like bot flying towards him in the air.  He sniffed the air.  His eyes 
bulged.  "I recognize that scent.  It is the stench of evil.  But how can I 
know that?"  He raises his arms above his head and lets out a primeval 
scream.  He floats upward without having to use his puny wings.

    Floating in the air his tiny limbs begin to glow.  As they pulse with 
iridescent light he pulls in his arms and legs only to fling them back out 
with a burst of energy.  Humanoid arms appear with the dragon's arms as a 
loose gray shirt covering his upper body.  Soon he pulls his legs in and 
flings them out as well.  This time the dragon's legs form loose pants the 
deep blue shade of the night sky.

    Again he flings back his head.  This time when he opens his mouth the jaw 
drops forming a chin guard.  Two scarlet fangs rise from this along his face 
to end in points at his cheekbones.  Two smaller fangs of a deep crimson 
reach from the top of the dragons jaw to the central top of his eye sockets.

    His previously rudimentary wings surge with power.  They slowly bulge and 
burst into large scaled wings.  With his transformation into his robot mode 
successful, Enertron flaps his large wings and flies toward the large evil he 
could smell from the ground.
